title: looking for duo and/or team
body:
Hey all,

looking for someone to play with in ranked solo/duo. im bronze and i main ADC or support. If interested send me a message. I also want ti create a team.

punchybrah

replies.body:
I main support always looking for good adc's
Add me :)

I’m keen. I haven’t been playing much lately and had a few years of and lost login details but made it to silver a few years back. Leveling up a new account now and would be keen to jump into ranked queues with anyone who is keen preferably flex as I want to level my solo alone. So I don’t feel carrried and can find my true rank. Add me if keen.
i main adc im also called the best bronze.........adc oce i play many adc i can also play supprot if i have to but i preffere not to
Hello, I main mid and top, I am also looking for a ranked partner, add me in game: Jamieizfgi

keen

I main mid + support, plus I'm learning adc :)
